text: The Laws of Moses were the laws that God is said to have given to Moses. The first set of Moses' laws were the Ten Commandments which covered morality. The second was the set of social laws (on property, inheritance, and marriage). The third were the laws on food (what's considered kosher or not, cooking and storage of food, etc). == Related pages == * Halakha ==References== Category:Old Testament
title: Law of Moses
